CANCELED.SUBJECT: MyBroodMinder Premium Expiring
CANCELED.MESSAGE1: Your MyBroodMinder Premium Membership has been canceled. Your premium benefits cease in two weeks.
CANCELED.MESSAGE1_COMP: Your MybroodMinder Complimentary Premium Membership is expiring. Your premium benefits cease in two weeks.
CANCELED.MESSAGE2: If you would like to re-subscribe,
CANCELED.MESSAGE4: Your subscription helps support our on-going efforts to improve beekeeping. Many of our team members generously volunteer their time and expertise, but we also have younger colleagues who are dedicated full-time and rely on a salary.

EXPIRED.SUBJECT: MyBroodMinder Premium Membership Expired
EXPIRED.MESSAGE1: Your MyBroodMinder Premium Membership expired yesterday. Your premium benefits have ceased.

RENEWAL.SUBJECT: MyBroodMinder Premium
RENEWAL.MESSAGE1: Your MyBroodMinder Premium Membership will be renewing in 2 weeks.
RENEWAL.MESSAGE2: Thank you for your support. Many of our team members generously volunteer their time and expertise, but we also have younger colleagues who are dedicated full-time and rely on a salary. Your support allows us to continue to evolve and enhance the world’s leading hive monitoring solution.

WARNING.HUBS: Your {{.count}} hubs will no longer upload data.
WARNING.HIVES: You have {{.count}} hives, but your membership allows {{.allowCount}}. You will need to deactivate {{.deactCount}} hives.
WARNING.THIRD_PARTY: Your {{.count}} third party devices will no longer upload data.
WARNING.ACCOUNT: You will no longer have access to Premium features. Including but not limited to calculated data, alerts, and forecasts.

PURCHASE.SUBJECT: Thank You for Supporting BroodMinder!
PURCHASE.MESSAGE1: Thank you for purchasing a MyBroodMinder Premium Membership!
PURCHASE.MESSAGE2: By joining us, you’re not only supporting the BroodMinder team but also contributing to the entire BroodMinder community, and most importantly, to the well-being of bees and the future of beekeeping. Your support is crucial as we continue to improve hive management and promote sustainable practices that benefit bees worldwide.
PURCHASE.MESSAGE3: While many of our team members generously volunteer their time and expertise, we also have younger colleagues who are dedicated full-time and rely on a salary. Your membership helps us evolve and maintain the world’s leading hive monitoring solution.
PURCHASE.MESSAGE4: We encourage you to explore our extensive documentation and video library. We’ve designed the system to be simple yet powerful, with many resources available to help you unlock its full potential.
PURCHASE.MESSAGE5: If you need any assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at support@broodminder.com.

PAYMENT.SUBJECT: Payment Recieved
PAYMENT.MESSAGE: Thank you, we have recieved payment for your MyBroodMinder Premium Membership

PRODUCT.TITLE: Products
PRODUCT.NEW: MyBroodminder Premium {{.count}} hives for 1 year. (Renews on {{.date}}) {{.amount}}
PRODUCT.UPGRADE: MyBroodminder Premium upgrade to %v hives per year. (Renews on %v) %v

UPDATE.SUBJECT: Changement sur l'Abonnement {{.type}}
UPDATE.MESSAGE: Votre Abonnement {{.type}} a été mis à jour.

PURCHASE_OT_TOKENS.SUBJECT: Jetons pour le hub achetés
PURCHASE_OT_TOKENS.MESSAGE: Vos jetons ont été ajoutés. {{.amount}} ont été chargés sur votre compte.

CANCEL.SUBJECT: MyBroodMinder Premium Membership Cancelled
CANCEL.MESSAGE1: Your MyBroodMinder Premium Membership has been canceled.
CANCEL.MESSAGE2: Your premium benefits will continue until {{.date}}. We will send a reminder two weeks before they end and you can resubscribe if you change your mind.
CANCEL.MESSAGE3: Your subscription helps support our on-going efforts to improve beekeeping. Many of our team members generously volunteer their time and expertise, but we also have younger colleagues who are dedicated full-time and rely on a salary.

PAYMENT_FAIL.SUBJECT: Échec du paiement de l'abonnement
PAYMENT_FAIL.MESSAGE: Le paiement du renouvellement automatique de votre abonnement a échoué. Veuillez aller sur {{.url}} pour corriger les informations de paiement

ACCOUNT_DELETE.SUBJECT: Statut de suppression du compte
ACCOUNT_DELETE.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Votre compte MyBroodMinder a été supprimé avec succès.
ACCOUNT_DELETE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Une erreur s'est produite lors de la suppression de votre compte. Veuillez contacter support@broodminder.com pour terminer la suppression du compte. (ReferenceID:{{.id}})

DATA_SUMMARY.NOFITNESS: signifie que nous n'avons pas assez de données pour décider de la bonne santé de la ruche.

BODY.NOEVENTFUTUR: Aucun événement à venir pour le moment
